title: Slope of a tangent line of an implicit function

content.question: What is the slope of the line tangent to the curve <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mi>sin</mi> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@424E@</annotation> </semantics> </math> at the point(2,0) ?

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
